item.title:
We believe that our thoughts and actions are the very source of our current conditions. Any change that we wish to bring about in our family, friends, workplace, community – can happen only when we change from within. The i in our Awaken i project, represents this great source of power within every individual, the hidden potential that each of us bring and the chance that each of us deserve - to innovate, create, take initiative and inspire people around us.
